column4: I'm trying to get a touchscreen module to load but It doesn't work
does anyone know where to put the driver file?
it's a serial touchscreen it doesn't show up
I can see it's output but Xorg doesn't load the driver
It's an Xorg driver not a kernel driver, does it still show up in lsmod then?
do you know where to put an xorg input driver?
i've tried all of the locations but it won't load strangely enough
somewhere under /usr/lib/xorg/modules from the looks of things
nope It still keeps complaining about not finding the driver
are you sure you have a compatible driver ?
well, it's compiled for xfree could the error be that i'm running Xorg?
well maybe I need to compile it for xorg then
I'll look into compiling xorg thanks for the help!
